items.title: Jim Cramer on Honeywell: “I Do Like the Stock Very Much”
items.description: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the 18 stocks Jim Cramer recently shared insights on. A caller asked if Cramer thinks they should pick up shares of the company before the split. In response, Cramer said: “The split’s not going to happen for a long time, sir, and the stock just had a run, […]
